Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Annotation

  • public class Annotation
extends java.lang.Object
    builds an Annotation object which consists of a list of Tag objects and additional information about the way how the annotation was generated (automatic or manual) the completion status and if it was as "global complete" annotated
    Author:
    Cristina Vertan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean autom
      true if the annotation was done automatic the information id needed for the visualisation in TagGUI.showProgress() and in TagGUI in lingAnnotFrame.addInternalFrameListener
      private boolean complete
      true if the annotation is complete (no further annotation necessary) needed by TranslitListModel.getElementAt(int); the token is coloured blue
      private boolean global
      true if the annotation was done global
      private boolean inProgress
      true if the annotation is complete needed by TranslitListModel.getElementAt(int); the token is coloured red
      private boolean isNE
      true if the token with this Annotation is part of an NE needed by TagGUI in lingAnnotFrame.addInternalFrameListener
      private java.util.ArrayList<Tag> listTag
      the list of Tag objects composing the Annotation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Annotation(boolean autom, boolean global, boolean complete, boolean ne, java.util.ArrayList<Tag> lt)
      builds a Tag object

      • autom

        private boolean autom
        true if the annotation was done automatic the information id needed for the visualisation in TagGUI.showProgress() and in TagGUI in lingAnnotFrame.addInternalFrameListener

      • global

        private boolean global
        true if the annotation was done global

      • complete

        private boolean complete
        true if the annotation is complete (no further annotation necessary) needed by TranslitListModel.getElementAt(int); the token is coloured blue

      • inProgress

        private boolean inProgress
        true if the annotation is complete needed by TranslitListModel.getElementAt(int); the token is coloured red

      • isNE

        private boolean isNE
        true if the token with this Annotation is part of an NE needed by TagGUI in lingAnnotFrame.addInternalFrameListener

        the list of Tag objects composing the Annotation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Annotation

        public Annotation(boolean autom,
                  boolean global,
                  boolean complete,
                  boolean ne,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Tag> lt)
        builds a Tag object
        Parameters:
        autom - true if the annotation is done automatically
        global - true if the annotation is performed global
        complete - true if the annotation is complete
        ne - true if the token is part of an NE
        lt - list of Tag objects

      • getSpecificTag

        public Tag getSpecificTag(java.lang.String s)
        returns from the list of tags the one with a given name; if there is no such tag returns null
        Parameters:
        s - name Tag.getName() of the Tag to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a Tag

      • getSpecificTag

        public int getSpecificTag(java.lang.String s,
                          java.lang.String s1)
        returns from the list of tags the one with a given name and with acertain value; if there is no such tag returns null used by TagGUI
        Parameters:
        s - name Tag.getName() of the Tag to be retrieved
        s1 - first letter of the value to be searched
        Returns:
        an integer the index of the found Tag

      • setSpecificTag

        public void setSpecificTag(java.lang.String s,
                           java.lang.String ns)
        modifies the name of the tag having a given name s with a new name ns
        Parameters:
        s - the name of the tag to be modifies
        ns - the new name of the tag

      • getMorphoValue

        public java.lang.String getMorphoValue(java.lang.String name)
        search for a tag havinh as attribute the one with a given name
        Parameters:
        name - Attribut.getName() of the morphological feature to be searched
        Returns:
        a string representing the values of the searched feature

      • findDoubleTagName

        public void findDoubleTagName(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String value,
                              java.lang.String newName)
        repales the name of a feature of a given tag. Used when inconsistencies in the names of the features occur, in correction processes
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Attribut object to be renames
        value - value of the attribute for which we give a new naem
        newName - new name to be assigned to the attribute

      • findDoubleTags

        public void findDoubleTags()
        find if there are within the same annotation two tags with same name used to eliminate duplicates dieffering e.g in capitaliaztion

      • setMorphoValue

        public void setMorphoValue(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String value)
        changes the value of a feature with a given name within a morphological annotation a morphological annoation has just one tag
        Parameters:
        name - name of the feature
        value - new value of the feature

      • setMorphoNewName

        newname - the new name of a feature
